title: My second account just got ban because of oce toxic rubbish player report
body:
Here are my text content: Game 1
Pre-Game
SUP Wolf: hi oce
In-Game
SUP Wolf: q?
SUP Wolf: your wall so good oce
SUP Wolf: blind?
SUP Wolf: care
SUP Wolf: ff
SUP Wolf: this duo noob bot lane
SUP Wolf: that's why still in silver
SUP Wolf: blind elo hell
SUP Wolf: ya
SUP Wolf: play your own then
SUP Wolf: no need to teamwork
SUP Wolf: elo hell
SUP Wolf: maybe you can delete the game
SUP Wolf: and ask your mum to bring you check the brain
SUP Wolf: i fed?
SUP Wolf: wtf?
SUP Wolf: their jg came in and bot lane didn't came to help
SUP Wolf: i fed ?
SUP Wolf: haha
SUP Wolf: ok
SUP Wolf: toxic duo
SUP Wolf: no need to play
SUP Wolf: ad , sup and mid are friends that's why
SUP Wolf: open
SUP Wolf: keep counter jg no one help
SUP Wolf: lmao
SUP Wolf: /all
SUP Wolf: that's why oce never won any match outside the competition
SUP Wolf: silver?
SUP Wolf: one week already gold 1 sad
SUP Wolf: you ?  s9  still in silver ?
SUP Wolf: sad
SUP Wolf: that's why mate
SUP Wolf: duo with toxic lux
SUP Wolf: think you r strong?
SUP Wolf: oce player
SUP Wolf: 141
SUP Wolf: lmao
SUP Wolf: teach me how to solo kill by morgan
SUP Wolf: 151
SUP Wolf: sad
SUP Wolf: they never help
SUP Wolf: no need to ask
SUP Wolf: they just play their own
SUP Wolf: that's why s9 still in silver
SUP Wolf: silver?
SUP Wolf: yo ?
SUP Wolf: sad
SUP Wolf: ya
SUP Wolf: oce world champion?
SUP Wolf: never
SUP Wolf: happen
SUP Wolf: can oce win 1 game in MSI ?
SUP Wolf: never
SUP Wolf: because oce server too much toxic like you so never improve mate
SUP Wolf: oce player so rubbish
SUP Wolf: 161 with first blood
SUP Wolf: 65 cs
SUP Wolf: i already give up sorry top
SUP Wolf: elo hells deserve to lose
SUP Wolf: 65 cs?
SUP Wolf: sad
SUP Wolf: 19 mins 65 cs
SUP Wolf: u main nerd?
SUP Wolf: well their jg came in and i call for help and these bot lane still farming lmao
SUP Wolf: suppose ez kill 4v1
SUP Wolf: but bot lane ?
SUP Wolf: blinmd
SUP Wolf: so sad
SUP Wolf: 3 duo
SUP Wolf: sad
SUP Wolf: angry china player smarter and richer than you baby?
SUP Wolf: look at our mid
SUP Wolf: so bad
SUP Wolf: our bot lane
SUP Wolf: dreaming
SUP Wolf: gg
SUP Wolf: if they know how to teamwork ez win in oce server
SUP Wolf: but they don't
SUP Wolf: so s9 still in silver hahah
SUP Wolf: don't ate too much fast food darling  destory your brain silver
SUP Wolf: find a girlfriend
SUP Wolf: although it's hard for you nerdy
SUP Wolf: 1/10/1
SUP Wolf: amost 1111
SUP Wolf: good to have teamwork
SUP Wolf: feeling sad his brain was broken because ate too much fast food
SUP Wolf: ap,sup and ad are dreaming atm how to play
SUP Wolf: 27mins 78 cs
SUP Wolf: worse than AI man
SUP Wolf: My grandma plays better than you
SUP Wolf: 2/13 and talk like a pro xdd
SUP Wolf: typing master
SUP Wolf: real rank silver xd


I think Riot ban system is so shitty and they never check what happens in the game and I got a ban after this match. WTF was that mean Riot you noob GM. That's why these servers never improve a lot and can't be won outside the big match because Riot banned the high elo player and allow the toxic player to keep playing.

replies.body:
Your level of play/elo does not in any way affect the standards of behaviour you are held to. It doesn't matter in the slightest whether you are Iron or Challenger, you were punished for your chat, not your rank.

You were punished for saying things like:

>SUP Wolf: this duo noob bot lane
SUP Wolf: that's why still in silver
>SUP Wolf: open
SUP Wolf: you ? s9 still in silver ?
SUP Wolf: sad
SUP Wolf: oce player so rubbish
SUP Wolf: i already give up sorry top
SUP Wolf: elo hells deserve to lose
SUP Wolf: sad
SUP Wolf: don't ate too much fast food darling destory your brain silver
SUP Wolf: find a girlfriend
SUP Wolf: although it's hard for you nerdy
SUP Wolf: 1/10/1
SUP Wolf: feeling sad his brain was broken because ate too much fast food
SUP Wolf: worse than AI man
SUP Wolf: My grandma plays better than you

Whatever the rest of your team was doing is basically irrelevant to your own behaviour, and if this was a permanent suspension, then this isn't your first warning that such behaviour isn't allowed.

You agree to abide by the rules of the community in order to continue playing the game, or you ignore the rules of the community and are removed from it. That is the choice you make.

This first thing is they were duo and I was getting my jungle resources in my own area. I warded up the riverside and clearly their jungler and ap were groupings to come counter me so that I pinged for help because I sense that so I already farm so deep in my jungle area and I call bot lane to come for backup because at the time karma was  b and he walks near me, but he won't answer me. Then it's fine I ping for help and I do the vision and no one help so I died. The thing that makes me angry is the bot lane suddenly started to ping my dead then, of course, I think every one of you must fight back because you already ping for help and no one came and they just blame you. And as I remember that sup and ap were duos so that they never came to cover me while I was getting counter jungle. So I felt so sad to this server, players were toxic, never playing with teamwork and just care about their kda so they never improve and they made old players like me lost the passion on this game anymore. I know my English was not that good but hope you guys understand, I was not judging oce player's skills but I want to say is if they didn't know how to teamwork in the game then don't come to play rank and troll because I really treat the game so serious.

> This first thing is they were duo and I was getting my jungle resources in my own area. I warded up the riverside and clearly **their jungler and ap were groupings to come counter** me so that **I pinged for help** because I sense that so I already farm so deep in my jungle area and I call bot lane to come for backup because at the time karma was b and he walks near me, but he won't answer me. Then it's fine I ping for help and I do the vision and no one help so I died. 

From what i could extracted out of that water fall was. You called for help, but no one came. And you insist on staying in the jungle knowing all that, and died. 

>  I think every one of you must fight back because you already ping for help and no one came and they just blame you.

Do your lanes have priority? If they don't, then why do you insist on making that play? Learn some advance tips for the role, and learn to do "vertical jungling" instead.

> So I felt so sad to this server, players were toxic, never playing with teamwork and just care about their kda so they never improve and they made old players like me lost the passion on this game anymore.

Oh, don't give me that crap. Take a step back and think on what you did wrong instead. Or are you too in love with yourself to criticise yourself?

the rules - "if you lose 200LP because of trolls you MUST not say ANYTHING and cop all that loss of time for our system is not able to monitor trolls" "Monitoring trolls is way to expensive so be a troll not a bad word user" 

- it's really got me thinking about what to test out now while i find a new game :D
im pretty sure you do not lose 200 lp from trolls exclusively,

And Riot Wonders why we want to server lock, so these people don't come on our server.

This is just as bad as referring to OCE as Dogs, if they can be insulting to us, then we should be allowed to insult them back
Except they're not allowed to any more than you are? He posted this because he got banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=QQQebebR,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2019-04-10T02:33:24.440+0000)
>
> Except they're not allowed to any more than you are? He posted this because he got banned.

Clearly not, i've seen more Chinese players on OCE than in years previous, and they're all the same, and they almost never get banned, short of them using a trigger word, it doesn't happen

> and they're all the same

What a loaded statement there. Atleast bring some reports to stake the claim.
I hate people who cuss other people out that can't even spell properly. Stop trying to flame people if you can't even spell to begin with.
I don't think the spelling is really the problem.
